thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 04 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ohio says insurers, benefit managers must disclose most affordable drug options

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ohio says insurers, benefit managers must disclose most affordable drug options
text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Ohio Dept Of Insurance :
* OHIO DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE SAYS IT ISSUES BULLETIN REQUIRING HEIGHTENED PROTECTION FOR OHIO CONSUMERS RELATED TO PRESCRIPTION DRUG PRICES
* BULLETIN PROVISIONS WILL TAKE EFFECT IMMEDIATELY * BULLETIN REQUIRES INSURERS, PBMS TO REMOVE “GAG ORDER” THAT PREVENTS DISCLOSING OF MOST AFFORDABLE PRESCRIPTION DRUG OPTION
* BULLETIN PROHIBITS HEALTH INSURERS, PMBS FROM CHARGING CONSUMERS MORE FOR PRESCRIPTION DRUGS THAN ITS COST OTHERWISE WITHOUT INSURANCE Source text: bit.ly/2IsdRtw
